## Principal Component Analysis

```{r}
USArrests
dimnames(USArrests)
apply(USArrests, 2, mean)
apply(USArrests, 2, var)

```
```{r}
pca.out = prcomp(USArrests, scale = TRUE)
pca.out
names(pca.out)
biplot(pca.out, scale=0, cex = 0.5)
```
